values: To con someone is to trick that person into doing something or giving up money.
It was unfair of the fortune teller to con me out of 500 dollars.
n.反对票，反对者,反对的论点，反对的理由vt.精读，熟读,默记，谙记prep.以…，用…,反对adj.欺诈的，骗取信任的adv.反面地，从反面
